scripts.validate-template: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation validate-template  --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json
scripts.stack-create: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName
scripts.stack-update: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName
scripts.stack-delete: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile
